description.value:
[Generic][Limited Use] □□□

Action Reaction

Trigger You would fail (but don't critically fail) a Reflex save to avoid a trap's effects.

Effect You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Step]{Step} and then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Drop Prone]{Drop Prone} in your new location. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your triggering Reflex save. If this would have been enough to resist the trap's effects initially, you succeed at the save instead.
